name: Lara Croft and the New Game
Mahmoud and Ehab and the even-odd game

Code: #include <stdio.h>int main(){    int i,n,hasilD = 0,hasil = 0;    scanf("%d",&n);    char arr[n];    scanf("%s",&arr);    for(i = 0 ;i<n-1;i++){        //printf("I SEKARANG : %d\n",i);        if(arr[i] != arr[i+1]){            hasilD++;            i++;        }        }    printf("%d",n-hasilD);    return 0;}

#include <stdio.h>
int main() { int l,r,a;scanf("%d%d%d", &l, &r, &a);while (l < r) { if (a > 0) { a--; l++; } else { r--; }}while (r < l) { if (a > 0) { a--; r++; } else { l--; }}while (a > 1) { r++; l++; a -= 2; }printf("%d", r + l);return 0; }

#include <stdio.h>
int main(){int l,r,a;scanf("%d%d%d",&l,&r,&a);while(l<r){if(a>0){a--;l++;}else{r--;}}while(r<l){if(a>0){a--;r++;}else{l--;}}while(a>1){r++;l++;a-=2;}printf("%d",r+l);return 0;}
